name: R E
description:
Congratulations! Your application has been reviewed and, given your level of qualification, you have been assigned a position in Refuse Relocation and Management. You start tomorrow. Management is excited to see how you perform, especially pertaining to your skills in managing and relocating refuse. We would like to wish you the best of luck, and hope you have a happy and productive first day!
